solution_line_template: Including tax, a pound of honey costs {bulk_price_per_pound} + {tax_per_pound} = <<{bulk_price_per_pound}+{tax_per_pound}={cost_per_pound_with_tax}>>{cost_per_pound_with_tax} dollars
The minimum purchase equals {minimum_spend_dollars} / {bulk_price_per_pound} = <<{minimum_spend_dollars}/{bulk_price_per_pound}={minimum_pounds_of_honey}>>{minimum_pounds_of_honey} pounds of honey.
Penny has bought {total_paid} / {cost_per_pound_with_tax} = <<{total_paid}/{cost_per_pound_with_tax}={pounds_bought_by_penny}>>{pounds_bought_by_penny} pounds of honey
Penny has exceeded the minimum purchase by {pounds_bought_by_penny} - {minimum_pounds_of_honey} = <<{pounds_bought_by_penny}-{minimum_pounds_of_honey}={exceeded_pounds}>>{exceeded_pounds} pounds.
